target: Things happen in the field, but...
source: Things happen in the field, but...

target: Itu menarik seperti kedengarannya. Ada sejumlah congressman yang menyerang balik memanfaatkan skandal terakhir ini untuk memberi lampu hijau program lainnya.
source: As intriguing as that sounds, there are some members of congress making too much hay out of this latest scandal to ever green-light another program.

target: Bro, kamu kayak Rachael Ray dengan Ganja.
source: Man, you're like the Rachael Ray of weed.

target: Kau sendirian bersamanya selama tiga bulan di Paris.
source: You were alone with him for three months in Paris.
